statements: SELECT * FROM smart_washing_machine_water_usage;
SELECT washing_machine_id, water_usage_gallons FROM smart_washing_machine_water_usage WHERE water_temperature_celsius > 30;
SELECT * FROM smart_washing_machine_water_usage WHERE usage_date = '2021-12-01';
SELECT water_usage_gallons, water_temperature_celsius FROM smart_washing_machine_water_usage ORDER BY water_temperature_celsius DESC;
SELECT washing_machine_id, SUM(water_usage_gallons) AS total_water_usage FROM smart_washing_machine_water_usage GROUP BY washing_machine_id HAVING total_water_usage > 2000;
SELECT * FROM smart_washing_machine_water_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC, water_usage_gallons ASC;
SELECT washing_machine_id, AVG(water_usage_gallons) AS AVG_WATER_USAGE_GALLONS FROM smart_washing_machine_water_usage GROUP BY washing_machine_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_washing_machine_water_usage WHERE water_temperature_celsius > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT washing_machine_id, usage_date FROM smart_washing_machine_water_usage WHERE water_temperature_celsius < 20;
SELECT washing_machine_id, SUM(water_usage_gallons) AS TOTAL_WATER_USAGE FROM smart_washing_machine_water_usage GROUP BY washing_machine_id HAVING SUM(water_usage_gallons) > 100;
SELECT * FROM washing_machine_data;
SELECT id, machine_id, water_usage FROM washing_machine_data WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, water_usage FROM washing_machine_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, location FROM machine_locations WHERE machine_id = 2;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM washing_machine_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT machine_id, timestamp, water_usage FROM washing_machine_data WHERE machine_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location FROM machine_locations WHERE id > 5;
SELECT machine_id, water_usage FROM washing_machine_data WHERE water_usage > 25 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY water_usage DESC;
SELECT machine_id, AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage FROM washing_machine_data GROUP BY machine_id HAVING AVG(water_usage) > 20;
SELECT * FROM washing_machine_data JOIN machine_locations ON washing_machine_data.machine_id = machine_locations.machine_id;
SELECT * FROM washing_machines;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM washing_machines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT serial_number, manufacturer, model FROM washing_machines WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' ORDER BY serial_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND latitude > 40;
SELECT machine_id, usage_date, water_consumed FROM water_usage WHERE water_consumed > 100 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM washing_machines WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT serial_number, manufacturer FROM washing_machines WHERE model = 'Front Load';
SELECT id, serial_number, manufacturer, model FROM washing_machines WHERE manufacturer = 'LG' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage WHERE water_consumed > 50 ORDER BY usage_date ASC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data;
SELECT id, machine_id, usage_date FROM water_usage_data WHERE total_water_used > 100;
SELECT * FROM washing_machines ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT id, model FROM washing_machines WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT id, machine_id, usage_date, total_water_used FROM water_usage_data ORDER BY total_water_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM washing_machines WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND brand = 'LG';
SELECT id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2022-08-01' ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, machine_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Maintenance' OR alert_type = 'Error' ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WashingMachine WHERE manufacturer = 'LG';
SELECT model_number, manufacturer FROM WashingMachine WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM User WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT machine_id, usage_date, gallons_used FROM WaterUsage WHERE gallons_used > 10 ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT conservation_measure, saving_estimate FROM WaterConservation WHERE implementation_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY saving_estimate DESC;
SELECT * FROM WashingMachine WHERE manufacturer = 'LG';
SELECT id, model_number FROM WashingMachine WHERE model_number > 1000 ORDER BY model_number ASC;
SELECT machine_id, gallons_used FROM WaterUsage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY gallons_used DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM User ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, conservation_measure FROM WaterConservation WHERE saving_estimate > 100 ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
